result.name: port-erin-manx-herring-sample-collection
result.notes:
A collection of Herring (*Clupea harengus*) otoliths and scales collected 
from 1954 to 1994 at the Port Erin Marine Laboratory, Isle of Man. These 
samples are currently in Cefas storage at Pinbush, Lowestoft. Also included 
are associated logbooks containing cruise details, vertebral counts, 
length/age keys etc.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
